mapper.insert: insert into t_user(username, password, nickname, email, sex, create_time, avatar, blog_num) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{createTime}, #{avatar}, #{blogNum});
mapper.update: update t_user set nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, sex = #{sex}, dream_college = #{dreamCollege}, avatar = #{avatar}, description = #{description}, signature = #{signature}, academic = #{academic}, school = #{school}, enrollment_time = #{enrollmentTime}, filed = #{filed}, address = #{address}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_feedback(title, content, create_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where username like "%" #{keyword} "%" OR nickname LIKE "%" #{keyword} "%"
